name: Microsoft Outlook Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Outlook Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Outlook API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Microsoft Outlook API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add an attachment to a message
Download (值: download) - Download an attachment from a message
Get (值: get) - Retrieve information about an attachment of a message
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve information about the attachments of a message

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the calendar to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the calendar to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: bccRecipients (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses of BCC recipients
categories (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
ccRecipients (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses of CC recipients
from (值: None) - The owner of the mailbox from which the message is sent. Must correspond to the actual mailbox used.
importance (值: None) - The importance of the message
bodyContentType (值: None) - Message body content type
isReadReceiptRequested (值: None) - Whether a read receipt is requested for the message
replyTo (值: None) - Email address to use when replying
saveToSentItems (值: None) - Whether to save the message in Sent Items

calendarId.name: calendarId
calendarId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Calendar | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: bccRecipients (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses of BCC recipients
categories (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
ccRecipients (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses of CC recipients
importance (值: None) - The importance of the message
isRead (值: None) - Whether the message must be marked as read
bodyContentType (值: None) - Message body content type
isReadReceiptRequested (值: None) - Whether a read receipt is requested for the message
toRecipients (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients
replyTo (值: None) - Email address to use when replying
subject (值: None) - The subject of the message

givenName.name: givenName
givenName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output | 默认值: simple

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields to add to the output
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: The fields to add to the output | 默认值: []

bodyContent.name: bodyContent
bodyContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Message body content

draftId.name: draftId
draftId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Draft | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - The fields to add to the output

to.name: to
to.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

fromAllCalendars.name: fromAllCalendars
fromAllCalendars.natural_language_description: 参数名: From All Calendars | 默认值: True

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the folder | (必填项)

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Folder | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

filtersNotice.displayName: Fetching a lot of messages may take a long time. Consider using filters to speed things up
filtersNotice.name: filtersNotice
filtersNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fetching a lot of messages may take a long time. Consider using filters to speed things up

filtersUI.name: filtersUI
filtersUI.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

replyToSenderOnly.name: replyToSenderOnly
replyToSenderOnly.description: Whether to reply to the sender only or to the entire list of recipients
replyToSenderOnly.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply to Sender Only | 作用: Whether to reply to the sender only or to the entire list of recipients | 默认值: False

toRecipients.name: toRecipients
toRecipients.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients
toRecipients.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients | (必填项)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output in Field | 提示: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

attachmentId.name: attachmentId
attachmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachment | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)
